snippet: Magnus Carlsen eked out a victory in the Candidates Tournament to win the right to challenge Viswanathan Anand for the world championship.
abstract: Dylan Loeb McClain Chess column; Magnus Carlsen ekes out a victory in the Candidates Tournament to win the right to challenge Viswanathan Anand for the world championship.
lead_paragraph: Magnus Carlsen eked out a victory in the Candidates Tournament to win the right to challenge Viswanathan Anand for the world championship.

headline.print_headline: No. 1 Player Gets a Chance To Pick Off the World Champ
headline.seo: Chess: Carlsen Wins Right to Challenge Anand
headline.main: No. 1 Player Gets a Chance to Pick Off the World Champ
